metadata.Name: CRAFT
metadata.Description: A dataset of 60 million high-quality Russian image-text pairs, adapted from LAION-5B for the Russian cultural context. The adaptation involved cleaning, machine translation of captions to Russian, and filtering based on image-text similarity.
Provider: Steklov Institute of Mathematics at St. Petersburg
metadata.Paper Title: CRAFT: Cultural Russian-Oriented Dataset Adaptation for Focused Text-to-Image Generation
Affiliations: Steklov Institute of Mathematics at St. Petersburg
metadata.Abstract: Text-to-image models have recently achieved unprecedented generation quality, but their performance is still lacking for specific domains and cultures. In this work, we present CRAFT (Cultural Russian-oriented datAset For fine-Tuning), a dataset of 60M high-quality image-text pairs in Russian, and release a series of text-to-image models fine-tuned on this dataset. We have developed a special data processing pipeline to adapt the LAION-5B dataset for the Russian cultural context. The pipeline includes cleaning, translation, and filtering stages. We show that fine-tuning on this dataset significantly improves the quality of generated images for Russian-specific queries and makes the models more robust to the nuances of the Russian language. We release the dataset and the models to the public.
